title: Coded Lexicon Analysis
description: Analyzes specific word choices and phrases to detect when language associated with particular groups (e.g., religious factions, extremist movements) is being used as a form of coded communication.
indicators: Matching word choices to known coded lexicons or phrase libraries associated with specific groups
Detecting shifts in vocabulary that align with known agendas or ideological signals
Identifying when certain terms are consistently used as 'dog whistles' or coded signals rather than straightforward language
